Name: PAFIN: PennLINC AFfective INstability- TEDANA+AROMA Derivatives
Description: Results of combining fMRIPost-AROMA and TEDANA ICA classifications in the PAFIN dataset.

GeneratedBy.Name: Custom code
GeneratedBy.Description: Custom Python code that combined the component classifications from fMRIPost-AROMA and TEDANA. After the classifications were combined, minimum image regression was applied to the mixing matrix and the rejected components were orthogonalized with respect to the accepted components.
